wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Craig Knight (born 28 June 1993) is an English first-class cricketer who has played first-class cricket and Twenty20 cricket for Derbyshire from 2011. He was born at Sheffield, Yorkshire. His contract was cancelled by mutual consent in July 2016.
